content: in this legal case a hereditary communion between the parties involved has been dissolved by the court the assets of the deceased mf will be divided among the heirs mv will receive three apartments ml will receive an apartment and a garage and vm will receive a plot of land vm will also be required to make adjustments to the plaintiffs the court referred to various articles of the civil code to determine the division of assets and collation of donations the plaintiffs accused vm of unlawfully taking money from bank accounts for personal use which was confirmed by a courtappointed expert the expert determined the shares of each party based on the total value of the estate and expenses incurred the court ordered the distribution of assets according to the experts proposal and assigned exclusive ownership to each party the costs of the litigation will be split equally between the parties
